Question: His Imperial Majesty **** I, By the Grace of God and the Constitutions of the Republic, Emperor of the French.
Hints: This person acknowledged one illegitimate son: Charles Léon (1806–1881) by Eléonore Denuelle de La Plaigne,.
Six weeks later, on the first anniversary of his coronation, this person defeated Austria and Russia at Austerlitz.
This person asserted the army would follow him, and Ney replied the army would follow its generals.
